Articles.Content: The title says it all, what was your favorite version?

0.90.0 was my favorite version. Not that I don't love 1.0, in fact, it is still the best version by far!

But 0.90.0 had the old aero model, and I do miss its exploits and quirks, though this one is far the better.
I like that 1.0 thing people keep talking about.
1.0. I don't need to make excuses about why that fire doesn't kill you anymore!
.20 was when I joined, so that gives me a little nostalgia

If we are talking fully stock, I say 1.0. If we are talking about with mods, .90 with Deadly Re-entry and Ferram

I started in .90, so I missed out on all the earlier versions. I hear there was a lot of fun to be had. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

0.16 adding planets and revamping aero parts was mind blowingly awesome. There was nothing as exciting as the Duna hill / magic boulder first findings/theories. I miss Nova's mindset about the game... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Voted '0.16-0.20'. The development of KSP in this 'period' could be described as Shock-and-Awe, with the implementation of many new planets and the phenomenom docking ... ! It was fantastic; many nail-biting attempts to dock two ships and fly the whole combination to this odd waterworld in orbit of a green gas giant, where a number of kerbals would end up in the drink and floated there for several years.
My favorite version will probably be 1.0.1 : I really like the new physics of 1.0, but the heat model definitely needs some fixing.

i voted for 21-23.5 mostly because i started in 21 (or was it 20? idk, but there was a 2 in there...), and also because career-mode is kindof lackluster for me, i miss the challenge of getting all the science from all the biomes...
1.0 by far, but up to now I'd have probably said 23.5
1.0 clearly... it's not even a contest.

All of them!! (except maybe 0.90.0, it ran really badly for me). Seriously though, I have loved every version of KSP since 0.15 when I started, very hard to pick a fav. 1.0 is so far very good, sure it has issues, but the ride isn't over yet.
Started in .19 or .20 (can't remember anymore), but 1.0 is by far my favorite version thus far.
